intro.title: Background
intro.description: We met with the Zeno CRM team at one of Europe's largest SaaS conferences in Dublin. Zeno is a CRM solution for small and medium-sized companies looking for new clients and partners to scale. Their goal is a stable flow of B2B leads and partnerships. We quickly found common ground and agreed to collaborate with ADvantage in the field of Cold Email lead generation.

goals.title: Project Goals
list: Find 6000 decision-maker contacts in the SaaS niche.
Develop a quality cold offer that lands in the inbox.
Create a lead magnet to increase engagement.
Research the effectiveness of different Subject Lines.

items.title: Difficult to reach inbox
items.description: The Zeno team faced low deliverability â€” their emails often went to spam or promotions.

items.title: Expensive contacts
items.description: Using LinkedIn Sales Navigator proved too costly for large-scale outreach.

items.title: Slow processing
items.description: Manual preparation and sending of 6000 contacts could take months.

items.title: Low brand trust
items.description: As a relatively new player, Zeno didn't yet have a strong reputation in the market.

solutions.title: How did we solve the problem? ðŸŽ¯
solutions.description: At ADvantage Agency, we developed a strategic Cold Email Outreach plan that included:

items.title: Target audience and geography definition
items.description: Target: CEOs, CTOs, Heads of Sales in small and medium SaaS companies. Geography: DE, NE, BE.

items.title: Finding contacts
items.description: Since the ADvantage team has its own parsing developments, we easily extracted a database of decision-maker contacts, conducted filtering, sorting, and verification.

items.title: Email strategy development
items.description: To make our contact through letters effective, we developed several logical sequences of letters in which we laid down hypotheses that should lead to conversion. We wrote effective email subjects that stood out among other offers.

items.title: Building automation
items.description: To process 6k contacts, we needed to build the appropriate infrastructure that met our needs and could satisfy the speed of delivery and personalization.

testing.title: Testing and Optimization
testing.description: For quality testing, we prepared effective Subject lines and email content in which we tested different messages that touched on different values that resonate with our target audience.

optimization.title: Campaign optimization and detailed analysis
optimization.description: For proper results, we don't just do mailings, we constantly conduct detailed analysis and make appropriate changes

points.title: Selected relevant offers
points.description: Constantly tested different offering options for the target audience

points.title: Selected relevant Subject lines
points.description: Focused on email subjects that showed high Open Rate metrics

points.title: Tested different follow-up variations
points.description: Connected additional variables for personalization and result improvement

points.title: Precise targeting
points.description: We only addressed relevant decision makers.

points.title: Personalization
points.description: Each email felt personal rather than mass-produced.

points.title: Delivery optimization
points.description: 98% of emails avoided spam thanks to our infrastructure.

points.title: Testing
points.description: Constant analysis allowed us to improve the campaign on the fly.

conclusion.title: Conclusion
conclusion.description: Thanks to the Cold Email campaign from ADvantage Agency, Zeno CRM received 118 responses from decision makers and 27 qualified leads (clients/partnerships). This became a stable lead generation channel that replaced expensive advertising platforms.
